title.About-me: I am a front-end developer with a background in wholesale and online marketing. My path eventually led me to web development - my passion for digital solutions that make life easier and more accessible. In my work, I attach great importance to clear structures, clean code and well thought-out user guidance. With in-depth knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, CSS and experience with Angular, I develop modern, intuitive single-page applications.

new-skills.SKILLS_PROMPT: Don't see the skill you need? Contact me. I'm always ready to learn!

portfolio-title.title: Here you have the opportunity to interact with my work and experience my skills first hand. Each project reflects my passion for innovation, precision and user-centred design.

PROJECTS.JOIN_DESC: Task and contact management app with Angular and Firebase. This modern Angular application provides a user-friendly platform for the efficient management of tasks and contacts. After secure authentication via Firebase, users can easily organise, edit and manage their tasks and contacts.
PROJECTS.POKEDEX_DESC: Pokémon Information Library (based on the PokéAPI) This simple and efficient JavaScript library provides access to extensive Pokémon information and catalogues it in a user-friendly structure. Based on the PokéAPI, it allows developers to quickly and easily retrieve data about Pokémon, including names, types, abilities, statistics and much more.
PROJECTS.PolloLoco: Pepe's Adventure: The jumping, running and throwing game Join Pepe, the brave hero, on his action-packed adventure! In this object-orientated jumping, running and throwing game, Pepe must collect coins, find spicy Tabasco salsa and hold his own against the crazy chicken. With a mix of skill, strategy and humour, this game offers fun and challenge for players of all ages.
PROJECTS.SOON: I am constantly working on new ideas, concepts and solutions in this area. It is my space for innovation, experimentation and personal development. But even more than that: it is a place that shows how enthusiastic I am about new challenges - whether in my own projects or in those that I realise for others.

REFERENCES.TITLE: References
REFERENCES.SUBTITLE: Feedback from the team - In the next section you will find what my colleagues say about working with me.

REFERENCES-1.NAME: Martin Bock
REFERENCES-1.REFERENCES: Dzmitry's involvement in the Cooking World group work helped us to complete the task ahead of schedule, he is very knowledgeable, very pleasant to work with and I would be happy to work with him again if I had the opportunity.

REFERENCES-2.NAME: Michael Spari
REFERENCES-2.REFERENCES: Dzmitry was a first-class team colleague at DA. His positive commitment and willingness to take on responsibility played a key role in helping us achieve our goals. In addition, his expertise was convincing across the board - with his in-depth knowledge and structured way of working, he was a valuable support for the entire team.

REFERENCES-3.NAME: Cem Erdogmus
REFERENCES-3.REFERENCES: Dzmitry is an excellent team member who is very pleasant to work with and a pleasure to work with. He was able to solve his tasks independently with great skill and always had an open ear when problems arose.

REFERENCES-4.NAME: Denis Maier
REFERENCES-4.REFERENCES: Dzmitry showed a high level of ownership throughout the project and a remarkable commitment to the quality of his work. Of particular note is his ability to communicate clearly and efficiently, which allowed the entire team to move forward quickly. He worked on both front-end development and task handling functionality, and his technical expertise in HTML, CSS and TypeScript was always at a high level.Dzmitry was also very conscientious in the implementation of responsiveness. He showed a good eye for detail and ensured that the design worked well on all devices. His structured approach to complex tasks and his ability to quickly recognise and resolve issues made him a valuable team member and he demonstrated a high level of flexibility and willingness to continuously adapt to achieve the best possible result. Dzmitry contributed significantly to the successful realisation of the project with his reliable and focused way of working.

CONTACT.TITLE: Want to discuss a new project?
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Say hello! let's discuss your ideas and make it happen
CONTACT.PRIVACY-SECAND: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
CONTACT.MASSAGE: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you as soon as possible.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.GENERAL_INFO_TEXT: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data with which you can be personally identified. Detailed information on the subject of data protection can be found in the following privacy policy.
PRIVACY.RESPONSIBLE_TITLE: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
PRIVACY.RESPONSIBLE_TEXT: The data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the section 'Note on the Responsible Party' in this privacy policy.
PRIVACY.HOW_COLLECT_TITLE: How do we collect your data?
PRIVACY.HOW_COLLECT_TEXT: Your data is collected in part by you providing it to us. This can be, for example, data that you enter into a contact form. Other data is collected automatically when you visit the website. This includes technical data such as IP address, browser used, or time of page access. This data helps ensure the website is displayed correctly.
PRIVACY.PURPOSE_TITLE: What do we use your data for?
PRIVACY.PURPOSE_TEXT: Part of the data is collected to ensure the proper functioning of the website.
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_TITLE: What rights do you have regarding your data?
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_TEXT: You have the right to obtain information about the origin, recipient, and purpose of your stored personal data at any time. You also have the right to request the correction or deletion of this data. You can contact us at any time if you have further questions about data protection.
PRIVACY.HOSTING_PROVIDER_TEXT: We host our website with the following provider:
PRIVACY.HOSTING_PROVIDER_DETAILS: The provider is ALL-INKL.COM - Neue Medien Münnich, Inh. René Münnich, Hauptstraße 68, 02742 Friedersdorf (hereinafter referred to as All-Inkl). For details, please refer to All-Inkl's privacy policy:
PRIVACY.HOSTING_LEGAL_BASIS: The use of All-Inkl is based on Art. 6 (1) (f) GDPR. We have a legitimate interest in ensuring the reliable presentation of our website.
PRIVACY.DATA_PROTECTION_TEXT: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations.
PRIVACY.RESPONSIBLE_ENTITY_TEXT: The responsible party for data processing on this website is:
PRIVACY.STORAGE_DURATION_TEXT: Your personal data will remain with us until the purpose for which it was stored no longer applies or until you request its deletion, provided there are no legal retention periods to the contrary.
PRIVACY.REVOKE_CONSENT_TITLE: Revocation of Your Consent to Data Processing
PRIVACY.REVOKE_CONSENT_TEXT: You can revoke any consent you have already given at any time. The legality of the data processing carried out until the revocation remains unaffected.
PRIVACY.OBJECTION_RIGHT_TITLE: Right to Object to Data Collection in Special Cases and to Direct Marketing (Art. 21 GDPR)
PRIVACY.OBJECTION_RIGHT_TEXT: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data if it is based on Art. 6 (1) (e) or (f) GDPR. For more information, please refer to this privacy policy.
PRIVACY.COMPLAINT_RIGHT_TITLE: Right to Lodge a Complaint with the Supervisory Authority
PRIVACY.COMPLAINT_RIGHT_TEXT: In the event of violations of the GDPR, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority.
PRIVACY.SSL_TEXT: This site uses SSL or TLS encryption for security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content.
PRIVACY.CONTACT_FORM_TEXT: If you send us inquiries via the contact form, your details from the inquiry form, including the contact details you provided, will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions. We do not pass on this data without your consent.
PRIVACY.CONTACT_FORM_LEGAL_BASIS: The processing of this data is based on Art. 6 (1) (b) GDPR (for contract fulfillment) or on your consent (Art. 6 (1) (a) GDPR).
PRIVACY.CONTACT_FORM_STORAGE: The data you enter in the contact form will remain with us until you request its deletion, revoke your consent to storage, or the purpose for data storage no longer applies.
PRIVACY.EMAIL_PHONE_TEXT: If you contact us by email or phone, your inquiry and all resulting personal data (e.g., name, phone number) will be stored.
PRIVACY.EMAIL_PHONE_LEGAL_BASIS: The processing of this data is based on Art. 6 (1) (b) GDPR (contract fulfillment) or on our legitimate interest in processing your inquiry (Art. 6 (1) (f) GDPR).
PRIVACY.COOKIES_TEXT: This website does not use cookies or tracking tools.

IMPRESSUM.TITLE: Imprint
IMPRESSUM.EU_DISPUTE_TEXT: In accordance with the Regulation on Online Dispute Resolution in Consumer Affairs (ODR Regulation), we would like to inform you about the Online Dispute Resolution Platform (OS Platform). Consumers have the opportunity to submit complaints to the Online Dispute Resolution Platform of the European Commission at https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/main/index.cfm?event=main.home2.show&lng=EN. You can find the necessary contact details above in our imprint.
IMPRESSUM.IMAGE_CREDITS_TEXT: The images, photos, and graphics on this website are protected by copyright.
IMPRESSUM.COPYRIGHT_TEXT: All texts are protected by copyright.
